Write-Up Text: People are fired up about the upcoming Federal Budget in Australia. Among other things clean energy and affordable housing are hot topics. The wind of change is blowing as tax breaks are offered to small businesses going eco-friendly while big property moguls may not be getting a free ride. The political opposition gets called out for dividing the nation while Tony Abbott's past words might affect campaigners. Cities may become more livable but pensioner support is under scrutiny. The need for expert analysis has never been more urgent.
